data.title: Musicians Born in 1955
data.meta_description: Birthdays in music in 1955. See which composers, musicians, pop stars and rockers were born in 1955 or search by date or keyword.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 223

Angela Winbush, American R&B and soul singer-songwriter, musician and record producer (René & Angela - "Your Smile"), born in St. Louis, Missouri
